title: Forecasting System
description: Developed order prediction and customer segmentation models using artificial neural networks. Utilized a FeedForward Neural Network and YOLO for demand forecasting.

title: Intrusion Detection System
description: Developed an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) using GMMs for anomaly detection, achieving high accuracy on the NSL dataset with Decision Tree and KNN.

title: Object Detection Using Mask R-CNN
description: Optimizing object detection in optical remote sensing images using Adaptive Mask R-CNN and advanced training techniques for improved accuracy.
